You are going the wrong way.
You seem to be heading toward that island.
Before we enter Egypt, we need to make a slight detour and meet someone.
He is a man who is extremely important to this journey.
It is such a tiny little island, and it looks deserted.
Mr. Joestar, does he really live here?
That is what he told me back in India.
Who do you mean by he?
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
Someone is watching us from the grass over there.
I kept the nutritional balance in mind and mixed in the shells you love, too.
Get nice and fat so you will be a tasty chicken, Lionel.
I will go talk to him.
I am traveling to Egypt with these three
No one comes to see me with good news!
It is only when something bad happens!
I do not want to hear it!
He left the world behind, and lives alone on this island.
I did not tell any of you about this
because if Dio were to find out that we had stopped here,
the peace Avdol's father enjoys here could be compromised.
I did not want to let that happen.
But telling him about his son Avdol's death
will not be easy to do...
Avdol's death was not your fault.
Is his father a Stand user, as well?
Yes, but I do not know what sort of Stand it is.
Given how his father has treated us,
it is hard to imagine he will help us.
I will try talking to his father.
Even if it was to avenge my sister's death,
I am still the one who let Avdol die.
I am sure there is nothing I can do to make it up to his father...
I wonder if it drifted up from some sunken ship...
It is got barnacles all over it.
Looks like it is made of gold, but...
There is some creepy face carved into it.
I will try to rub these barnacles off.
Did the air trapped inside burst out all of a sudden?
It is not Aladdin's magic lamp or anything...
Tell me three things you desire.
I want to thank you for freeing me from the lamp.
So tell me your three wishes.
Are you a new Stand user?!
Judging from your power, your user must be close by!
Is the answer to that question your first wish?
Are you sure you want to make a boring wish like that?
Do not I will grant you three wishes me!
Are you saying you could make me a super rich man right now?
Just try it if you can!
Stop messing with me, damn it!
It was not the enemy's Stand?
He did not attack me, but told me to make three wishes.
I do not know what is going on, but I have got to be cautious.
I will have to tell Mr. Joestar about what just happened.
It could have something to do with Avdol's father, as well.
I hear a really loud metallic sound...
Th-This is gold from the Napoleonic era.
It is not an illusion, or a dream.
It is a real treasure of gold!
If he were mocking me, when did he bury this here?
He did not have time to bury this after I made my wish.
How did he bring this here?
I shall grant it for you.
What are you plotting, doing something like this?!
Like I would fall for your trap!
If you are my enemy, act like it, and fight me!
Or I am going to take this treasure.
Is the answer to that question your second wish?
Are you sure you want to make a boring wish like that?
To thank you for letting me out of that lamp, I will grant you any wish.
That was my dream as a kid!
I want to be bigger than Disney!
Do not make me some pathetic sap.
I am going to build Polnareffland!
and a relationship like we are bound by the red string of fate...
I want to meet a girl who feels the way I do!
If you can do that, do it right now, damn it!
Is the answer to that question your second wi
Bring my dead sister back to life!
Bring my friend, Avdol, back to life!
You cannot do that, can you?!
You said... you can grant that?
But you made two wishes there,
so I will grant them one at a time.
I will start with your second wish, your sister.
I-It sounded like the ground was being dug up...
My little sister is buried back at home in France...
Just who the hell are you?!
He could not have run into the enemy, could he?
It is you, is not it?
Why are you running away, Sherry?!
I have been wanting a new umbrella.
It looks like it was bitten apart.
It is me, your older brother!
And my hair is all scraggly...
Do not worry about that, Sherry!
No matter how dirty, you are still you.
Have I ever said that I hated you?
When I gave your tropical fish to the cat...
You got really angry and said you hated me.
Yeah, I was angry then, but I have always loved you!
You will love me, no matter what I do?
I will always love you, no matter what.
You do not know how much I have missed you.
I am not crying because I am sad.
because I can eat you, Brother!
I am sorry that I bit you, Brother.
But if I eat your flesh, Brother, I will return to normal.
It is okay if I eat you, right?
You always did what I asked you to.
My only power is to grant wishes.
The rest is up to you.
Th-Then I will tell you my third wish!
You still do not get it, Polnareff?
I am the Stand that suggests the Judgment card!
My power is to grant the wishes people hold
deep in their hearts, giving them form from dirt.
You made your own sister, from your own heart!
Anything you have created, I cannot unmake.
You said something about a third wish,
but you have already made your third wish, have not you?
When a man wishes from the heart,
all of his greatest weaknesses come to light.
I never thought you would be this hurt.
I will get better if I eat, right?
